description: Tracks features/fixes in this fork that diverge from upstream clawdbot. Check before syncing upstream.

features.description: Make baseUrl and models optional in ModelProviderSchema, allowing users to define providers with just apiKey for built-in providers (e.g., openai, google). Also adds null check in normalizeGoogleProvider() for providers without models array.
features.reason: Config validation failed when users set models.providers.openai.apiKey without specifying baseUrl/models for built-in providers.

features.description: Add per-group requireMention support for Signal groups. Groups default to requireMention=true (only respond when bot is @mentioned). Supports native signal-cli mentions (number/uuid) plus regex fallback via mentionPatterns config. Includes SignalGroupSchema in Zod validation, per-group enabled/allowFrom overrides, and wildcard '*' default config.
features.reason: Signal groups triggered replies on every message, unlike Telegram/Discord which require explicit mentions. This led to undesired bot responses in group chats.
